name: Hero With 6 Faces
description:
A heroic die must fight an evil beast made of his fallen comrades. You must roll, shoot, and survive to defeat the beast and save your friends.

Made for GMTK Game Jam 2022. The theme was "Role of the Dice". In this game a role of the dice may be all that separates you from saving your friends or joining them.

If the WebGL version doesn't work well, try the downloadable version.

Made July 2022

Made in ~2 Days.
